item.title: Column 13, 14th July
item.description:
Road sign on Column (13) on the avenue has slipped down. The sign is dangerously low and is now a safety issue.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): The Avenue, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ridiculous Dip/Sink In Road - URGENT, 14th July
item.description:
There is a fairly deep sinkhole located on Harold Road, London, SE19 (between Ravensdale Gardens & Highfield Hill) It can be invisible to the eye as it is smooth and has no cracks or digs on the surface. However what makes it lethal is the size and depth. Please send someone to mend or fill this urgently, as it can be dangerous to motorists, pedestrians and cyclists. I drove over this and it damaged the undercarriage of my vehicle. This is also used as a bus route for the 450. See images attached.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Harold Road, Upper Norwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping & bin overflow rubbish, 14th July
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Middleton Road, Hackney, London

item.title: The corner of Westbourne Road & Newlands Park, 14th July
item.description:
Dog excrement is outside 32 Newlands Park and all along the side of Westbourne Road (every day). We need signage to remind dog walkers to clean up after their dogs. Broken glass, rubbish and a couple of bikes today.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westbourne Road, Penge, London
